div.h1: Thank you for submitting your request. You will get Notification on approval processes

div.class: mb-5 py-2 justify-content-center col-12 s_website_form_submit button_go_back

a.class: btn btn-primary btn-lg s_website_form_send o_default_snippet_text oe_right

i.class: fa fa-pencil fa-2x mx-auto rounded-circle bg-primary

div.p:
Add Your Request
and follow the process.

i.class: fa fa-unlock-alt fa-2x mx-auto rounded-circle bg-o-color-5

div.p:
Once your submit.
Manager recieves your request

i.class: fa fa-hourglass-start fa-2x mx-auto rounded-circle bg-secondary

div.p:
If submitted
Approval Process takes place.

i.class: fa fa-plane fa-2x mx-auto rounded-circle bg-o-color-3

div.p:
Manager Approves this,
You get Notified.

div.div: Separate email addresses with a comma.
